RESTRICTED 
 
NO.CAS-8(1)/2008/Div.I (Vehicle) 
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY 
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION) 
A’ WING , JANPATH BHAWAN   
JANPATH, NEW DELHI 
Date: 06/11/2008 
 
 
CIRCULAR No. 12/2008 
 
SUBJECT:- ACCESS OF VEHICLES UPTO THE AIRCRAFT AT CIVIL 
AIRPORTS IN THE COUNTRY ON PROTOCOL / 
SECURITY / MEDICAL GROUNDS. 
 
 
 
Please refer to this Bureau Circular No. 13/2005 dated 11.4.2005 on the 
subject cited above. 
 
2. 
 Shri S. Jaipal Reddy, Hon’ble Minister for Urban Development, is 
permitted to avail facility of Airport Operators’ ferry vehicle to and from aircraft, 
during arrival and departure, at all civil airports in the country for a period of one 
year, on medical grounds. 
 
 
 
 
                                        (M. Malaviya) 
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA)  
 
 
Distribution as per list attached/overleaf.
